channel.title: Exp rate
channel.description: How do i change the xp Rate of Combat?

item.title: Exp rate
item.dc:creator: @Sno0K Sno0K
item.description:
@Sno0K wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:22, topic:264768”][quote author=Pure Destiny link=topic=349586.msg2687187#msg2687187 date=1235750511]

[quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=349586.msg2687160#msg2687160 date=1235749653]
Use the search bar.
[/quote]That’s 90% of your posts. Dude, all you say is that. And don’t bring that 'This isn't a spoon-feeding community. Read the rules, buddy. When a question is asked repeatedly at least 10 times a day, I think people can find it by searching instead of being lazy.' shit up, atleast try to help, this answer is only asked 2 times a week, the answer is not within 3 pages of Google or the entire list of MoparScape search. So just help or stfu.
[/quote]Telling somebody to use the search bar is helping.[/quote]

He doesn’t need to spam it all over the forum. If Chassy was the owner of moparscape, if you creat a topic in the server help section, there should stand in the size of a 22" screen, USE THE SEARCHBAR…

Read full topic

item.title: Exp rate
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Destiny Pure Destiny
item.description:
@Pure_Destiny wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:16, topic:264768”][quote author=Pure Destiny link=topic=349586.msg2687238#msg2687238 date=1235751728]

[quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=349586.msg2687234#msg2687234 date=1235751630]

[quote author=Pure Destiny link=topic=349586.msg2687219#msg2687219 date=1235751077]

[quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=349586.msg2687216#msg2687216 date=1235751011]

[quote author=Pure Destiny link=topic=349586.msg2687214#msg2687214 date=1235750942]

[quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=349586.msg2687208#msg2687208 date=1235750889]

Use the search bar.
[/quote]That’s 90% of your posts. Dude, all you say is that. And don’t bring that 'This isn't a spoon-feeding community. Read the rules, buddy. When a question is asked repeatedly at least 10 times a day, I think people can find it by searching instead of being lazy.' shit up, atleast try to help, this answer is only asked 2 times a week, the answer is not within 3 pages of Google or the entire list of MoparScape search. So just help or stfu.

And how exactly is that post right there helping?
[/quote]You tell me how the fuck [quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=349586.msg2687160#msg2687160 date=1235749653]
Use the search bar.
[/quote] in 200 topics a day help.

We are trying to enforce searching resources before spamming the forum. You have 15 posts and registered today, I really don’t think you know what you’re talking about.
[/quote]Aha shut up.
You think that Mopar would create a help section for morons to spam [quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=349586.msg2687160#msg2687160 date=1235749653]
Use the search bar.
[/quote] every 10 seconds 24/7?

It isn’t spam. It’s a rule.
[/quote]Rofl, so why doesn’t staff make it so only staff can post in here, and have a big ass sticky saying ‘USE THE SEARCH BAR!’
Oh btw you still didn’t tell me, where the hell was the help in your post.

I don’t spoon-feed. It can easily be found by the search bar, and if you actually took the time to read the stickies maybe you would know that it DOES say to use the search bar first.
[/quote]Maybe if you could read, you would of read in over 30% of the topics you said Use the search bar. in have told you;
I HAVE GOOGLED IT AND USED THE SEARCH BAR SO PLZ DONNT TELL ME TO SEARCH IT !!!

Wow.

Then it can be open for further help. Half of those topics are also lying and the owners are being lazy. /End of discussion
[/quote]No you just used that as an excuse.
Half of those topics aren’t lying, the other half isn’t lying either. You just like to say ‘Search.’
in EVERY topic to get a higher post count. I wouldn’t be surprised if I seen you say ‘Search bar.’ in a Download Topic.

You have no idea what you’re talking about. I am sick of lazy people in the forums, so I tell them to search for it if I have seen previous topics about it. I don’t give a shit about my post count, tbh.[/quote]Then stfu and stop telling people to search for it when more then 50% of the people you tell to search for it has already searched for it.

Read full topic

I HAVE GOOGLED IT AND USED THE SEARCH BAR SO PLZ DONNT TELL ME TO SEARCH IT !!!

Then it can be open for further help. Half of those topics are also lying and the owners are being lazy. /End of discussion

Half of those topics aren’t lying, the other half isn’t lying either. You just like to say ‘Search.’
in EVERY topic to get a higher post count. I wouldn’t be surprised if I seen you say ‘Search bar.’ in a Download Topic.[/quote]

You have no idea what you’re talking about. I am sick of lazy people in the forums, so I tell them to search for it if I have seen previous topics about it. I don’t give a shit about my post count, tbh.

And how exactly is that post right there helping? Also, how would you know how many times it’s been posted? You have 14 posts and registered today. Smart.
